title: Replace Maui Lane logo with the user-provided image

requirements.text: Replace the Maui Lane Care Home logo used in the app header with the user-provided image, and ensure the application consistently references the updated logo asset path.

quotes: replace logo with the image provided

acceptanceCriteria: The header logo in `frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShell.tsx` displays the user-provided logo image.
No part of the UI references non-existent or outdated logo filenames (e.g., `/assets/generated/maui-lane-logo-v2.dim_512x512.png`) after the change.
The logo `alt` text remains in English and continues to read "Maui Lane Care Home".

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (shadcn UI components are read-only).
Do not change authentication gating or routing behavior as part of this logo swap.
nonGoals: Do not redesign the overall app shell layout or navigation.
Do not change the app icon/favicon unless explicitly requested.

edits: Replace the existing Maui Lane logo asset with the user-provided image (frontend/public/assets/generated/maui-lane-logo.dim_512x512.png > frontend/public/assets/generated/maui-lane-logo-provided.dim_512x512.png)
